text: The Angels in Neon Genesis Evangelion are mysterious alien beings and the major enemies of the franchise. == List == === In the anime === * Adam * Lillith * Sachiel * Shamshel * Ramiel * Gaghiel * Israfel * Sandalphon * Matarael * Sahaquiel * Ireul * Leilel * Bardiel * Zeruel * Arael * Armisael * Tabris * Lilin Category:Anime characters Angels in Neon Genesis Evangelion
title: List of Angels in Neon Genesis Evangelion
